# PTD Today – Daily (Homepage • last 24 hours) Intelligence Brief

## 1) Top themes
- Offshore wind technology and capacity advancements
- Market leadership in offshore wind turbine manufacturing
- Expansion of renewable energy infrastructure (offshore wind)

## 2) Top stories
- China maintains its lead in single-unit capacity offshore wind turbines in 2025, while Vestas has installed its 15 MW turbine at offshore wind farms. (Source: offshorewind.biz)

## 3) Sector takeaways
### Renewables
- China continues to dominate global offshore wind turbine capacity, reinforcing its leadership in renewable energy infrastructure development.
- Vestas’ installation of a 15 MW turbine marks continued innovation and scaling in offshore wind turbine technology.

## 4) Notable companies/regions mentioned
- China (regional leader)
- Vestas (turbine manufacturer)
